definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: encounter, befall (‖ form of [[קָרָה]], q.v.; SI:4 [[לקרת]] to meet, opposite; Ar. qara0’a put part to part; Min. [[קרא]] set opposite, Hom:Chrest. 127);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: :131 Pf.:5 3 ms. sf. [[קְרָאַנִי]] Je 13:22, Job 4:2; 3 fs. [[קָרָאת]] De 31:29; Je 44:23, etc; Impf.:4 3 ms. [[יִקְרָא]] Ge 49:1, sf. [[יִקְרָאֶנוּ]] Ge 42:4; 3 fpl. [[וַתִּקְרֶאנָה]] Le 10:19; Ex 1:10 rd. 3 fs. sf. [[תִּקְרָאֵנוּ]] (Sam Vrss Di Ges:§ 47 k So:Kau Baen); inf. cstr.:121 [[לקְרַאת]] (Ges:§ 19 k Ol:§ 137), Ge 15:10 +, etc.; Pt. fpl. sf. [[קרְאִתַיִךְ]] Is 51:19;—

meet, encounter, only inf. cstr. [[לִקְרַאת]] oft.= prep. toward, against (Kö:ii. l, 317), almost always c. acc. pers., after vb. of motion, Is 7:3, Ge 19:1, Ge 24:17, Ju Jdg 4:18, Jdg 4:22, 1Ki 2:8 +; in war, battle, Ju Jdg 7:24, Jdg 20:25, Jdg 20:31, 1Sa 4:1, 1Ki 20:27 +, after [[עָרַךְ]] 2Sa 10:9, 2Sa 10:10, 2Sa 10:7 +, Ps 35:3 v. I. [[סגר]]

definitions.title: 2 b
definitions.body: ; ´[[לְחַזֵּק לִבָּם לִק]]: [[הַמִּלְחָמָה]] Jos 11:20 to harden their heart to encounter the war with Isr.; after [[הִנֵּה]] (without vb. of motion), † 1Sa 10:10, 2Sa 15:32, 2Sa 16:1, 1Ki 18:7, Pr 7:10; in constr. praegn. ´[[וַיִשְׂמַח לִק]]: Ju Jdg 19:3 he rejoiced to meet him, + 1Sa 6:13 (LXX We Dr al.); ´[[חרד לִק]]: 2Ki 10:15, [[נחב]] Ex 5:20, Ex 7:15 Nu 22:34, etc.; redund. ´[[לִק]] :´[[יִקָּרֶה י]]: Nu 23:3; implic. of helping, Is 21:14, Ps 59:6 (fig.); [[נְחָשִׁים]] ´[[לִק]]: Nu 24:1 he did not go to encounter (in expectation of) signs of divination; in metaph. Is 14:9, [[אֱלֽהֶיְ]] ´[[לִק]]: Am 4:12
fig. befall c. acc. pers., bad sense Ge 42:4, Ge 42:38, De 31:29, Je 13:22, Je 44:23, Is 51:19, Job 4:14, Le 10:19; of war Ex 1:10 (v. supr.) in gen., Ge 49:1.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: meet unexpectedly; Pf. 3 ms. [[נִקְרָא]], c. [[עַל]] pers. Ex 5:3; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּקָּרֵא]], c. [[לִפְנֵי]] pers. 2Sa 18:9; Pf. 2Sa 20:1 c. [[שָׁם]], chanced to be there; Impf. of bird’s nest De 22:6 ([[לִפְנֵי]]); Inf. abs. [[נִקְרׂא]] v. [[קרה]].

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[וַחַקְרֵא]] Je 32:23 thou didst cause all this evil to befall  them (acc. pers. et rei).
